name: ikagaka.shell.js
description: Ukagaka Shell Renderer for Web Browser

scripts.setup: npm install -g gulp-cli bower typings http-server mversion
scripts.init: npm run update; npm run build
scripts.update: npm update; bower update; typings install
scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc   && babel lib    -d es5&& gulp build&& browserify es5/index.js --standalone Shell -o dist/Shell.js
scripts.start: http-server -s & tsc -w & babel lib -w -d es5 & gulp watch &   watchify es5/index.js --standalone Shell -o dist/Shell.js -v
scripts.replace: npm run perl; npm run add
scripts.perl:
cat tsconfig.json | perl -lne 'print $1 if /^\s+"src\/([A-Za-z]+)\.ts",/' | perl -lne 'print if /[^(index)]/' | perl -lpe 's/(.+)/import * as _$1 from ".\/$1"; export var $1 = _$1;/ '> src/index.ts; echo 'var _package = require("../package.json"); export var version = _package.version;
import $ = require("jquery"); window["$"] = window["$"] || $;' >> src/index.ts;

author: Ikagaka
